channel.title: Knights and Knaves, revisited :: CIS 301 Textbook
channel.description: Recall the Knights and Knaves puzzles from section 1.2. In addition to solving these puzzle by hand, we can devise a strategy to first translate a Knights and Knaves puzzle to propositional logic, and then solve the puzzle using a truth table. Identifying propositional atoms To translate a Knights and Knaves puzzle to propositional logic, we first create a propositional atom for each person that represented whether that person was a knight.
